summary: Hillary Clinton claims that Bernie Sanders and his campaign are trying to undermine and misrepresent her record on being tough on Wall Street. She asserts that she has a record that is publicly available to support her claims. This statement was made during a meeting with the press on April 4th, 2016.

Hillary Clinton claimed during a debate in April 2016 that sending emails to government employees on their government accounts was a matter of convenience and she had every reason to believe they were in the government system. She admitted that it was not the best choice and considered it a mistake.
